aboutMe.description: I love building fast, efficient websites for clients. With experience in every step of web development—from meeting clients to coding—I use top-notch tools to create sites similar to the one we're currently on.

workExpA.title: Freelance Web Developer
workExpA.description: Enjoying working on personal web projects.

workExpD.title: Systems Engineering & Analysis
workExpD.description: Designing systems to provide optimal solutions.

serviceSection.title: Offered Services
serviceSection.description: Building awesome websites with React's magic! Tailored designs and smooth interfaces for your standout online presence.

serviceA.title: Custom React Web Development
serviceA.description: Tailored development of dynamic and responsive websites from scratch.

serviceB.title: React Frontend Development
serviceB.description: Creating sleek and user-friendly interfaces using React.js.

serviceC.title: Full-Stack Development with React and Strapi.js
serviceC.description: Integration of React for frontend and Strapi.js for backend solutions.

serviceD.title: React UI/UX Enhancement
serviceD.description: Improving existing React applications for better user experiences.

serviceE.title: Responsive Web Design with React
serviceE.description: Developing mobile-responsive websites using React for cross-device compatibility.

testimonials.title: Praise & Acknowledgments
testimonials.description: Explore testimonials shared by former colleagues and professionals I've worked with. Their words offer insights into my work ethic and collaborative skills.

first.praise: I am delighted to recommend Peyman as a standout Full Stack Developer. Peyman possesses an impressive blend of technical expertise and creative problem-solving skills that significantly contributed to the success of Sajayanegar's projects. Their proficiency in both front-end and back-end development is exemplary, ensuring seamless and efficient functionality across the entire stack. What sets Peyman apart is not only his technical capabilities but also his kindness, i won't forget his smille .... I have no doubt that Peyman would be a tremendous asset to any organization seeking a top-tier Full Stack Developer or a freelancer one!
first.name: Hani Vahdani - Business Development Manager

second.praise: Working with Peyman as a developer was an exceptional experience. His technical prowess is truly impressive; he navigated us through complex challenges effortlessly, despite my limited technical knowledge. His guidance and expertise were invaluable, making every hurdle seem manageable. Working alongside Peyman was a testament to professional excellence, leaving me astounded by his skill and professionalism as a developer.
second.name: Kamran Mogharian - Manager

toolsSection.description: I excel in effective communication, dedicating time to deeply understand clients' challenges and needs, ensuring tailor-made solutions.
toolsSection.tDescription: In my toolkit, I rely on React, Tailwind CSS, Strapi.js, and JavaScript to craft efficient and scalable web solutions.

first.title: Smart Solutions
first.description: React helps me create smart and advanced features. I use its powerful tools to build solutions that fit each customer's unique needs. By using its flexible setup, I solve tricky challenges effectively and get the best results.

second.title: Elegant Design
second.description: Design matters in every project I do. I focus on making beautiful and easy-to-use designs. My goal is to make designs that look great and work great, giving users a memorable experience.
